'''Haishan''' {{Lang|zh=海山|zh_rm=Hǎishān|zh_lit=Sea Mountain}} is the name of a sea monster slain by [[Beidou]]. It is referred to as a "hydra" like a large fish and dragon. Beidou and her fleet battled Haishan for four days using their harpoons and arrows. At night, Beidou beheaded the beast in a single lethal strike. After slaying Haishan, Beidou received her [[Electro]] [[Vision]].<ref>{{Ref/CS|Beidou|Vision}}</ref>

[[Tea Master Liu Su]] also recounts the tale through [[The Wrath of Haishan]] in the [[Commission]] ''[[Cliffhanger]]''.

Beidou's feat has even impressed the adeptus [[Xiao]].<ref>{{Ref/VO|Xiao|About Beidou}}</ref>
